poolGRGminimumSatisfied(address,address,.details: external check if minimum pool GRG amount requirement satisfied.

params.amount: Number of tokens to be transferred.
params.tokenAddress: Address of the token to be transferred.

returns.shortfall: Number of GRG pool operator shortfall.

transferToSelfCustody(address,address,ui.details: transfers ETH or tokens to self custody.

returns._1: Number of GRG pool operator shortfall.

devdoc.title: Self Custody adapter - A helper contract for self custody.
